value.original: The Project Cycle Window defines the steps associated with a specific Project.You may want to define several Project cycles to differentiate the different types of projects. Project cycles may use all or a subset of the used Project Status (e.g. Your opportunity project cycle may include the steps from prospect to contract - the service cycle may include steps from installation to customer acceptance.

row.value: 项目环节窗口定义了与特定项目相关的各个步骤.你可能想要定义几个不同的项目环节用来区别应用于不同的项目类型.项目环节可能使用所有或者部分使用中项目的状态(例 你的工作机会项目环节可能要包括从寻找到合约的各个步骤 - 服务环节可能要包括从安装到客户接收的各个步骤.

value.original: The Language Window allows you to define multiple parallel language for users. This allows users to access the same data but have the windows, tabs and fields appear in different languages.If a language is a System Language, you can change the User Interface to this language (after translation). Otherwise the language is only used for printing documents. For the language code, we suggest using the Java convention of country and language (e.g. fr_CN - Canadian French). Verify the translation creates missing translation records. Start this process after creating a new language.

row.value: 语言设置窗口可以使你为用户定义多种平行的语言. 就是指用户可以使用不同语言的窗口,表格和域访问相同的数据.如果一种语言时系统语言的一种,你可以把届面改成这种语言(翻译后). 否则这个语言只能应用于文档打印. 对于语言代码，我们建议使用Java的国家和语言转换符(例. fr_CN - Canadian French). 确认翻译生成了新的翻译记录. 创建一个新语言后,开始这个进程.

value.original: Maintain Project Types and their Phases with standard performance information

row.value: 应用标准的运营信息设置项目的类型和他们的环节.

value.original: The Client is the highest level of an independent business entity. Each Client will have one or more Organizations reporting to it. Each Client defines the accounting parameters (Accounting Schema, Tree definition, Non Monetary UOM's).Do not create a new client in this window, but use "Initial Client Setup" to set up the required security and access rules. If you create a new client here, you will not be able to view it and also the required client infrastructure would not have been set up.

row.value: 客户是最高级别的独立经济实体. 每个客户会拥有一个或多个向他汇报的组织. 每个客户定义账目参数 (帐单设计, 组织结构定义, 非金钱计量单位).别在这个窗口创建新用户, 但可以用 "建立初始化客户" 来建立强制的安全和访问规则. 如果你在这建立一个客户,你将无法观察它并且强制的客户结构也不会被建立.

value.original: The Role Window allows you to define the different roles that users of this system will have. Roles control access to windows, tasks, reports, etc. For a client an Administrator and User role are predefined. You may add additional roles to control access for specific functionality or data.You can add users to the role.

row.value: 规则窗口可以为这个系统内的所有用户定义不同的规则. 规则控制对窗口,任务,报告等的访问. 对于一个客户端,会预定义一个Administrator和User规则. 你可能需要添加更多的规则用来控制对特定功能和数据的访问.你可以向规则里添加用户.

value.original: The User Window allows you to define each User of the system. Users can log into the system and have access to functionality via one or more roles.

row.value: 此窗口定义系统的每个用户。用户可以以不同的角色的身份登录到系统中访问各种功能。

value.original: The Organization Window allows you to define and maintain Organizational entities. An Organization is often a legal entity or sub-unit for which documents and transactions are processed

row.value: 此窗口定义和维护机构实体。一个机构通常是一个合法实体或者其处理凭证和交易的子单元。

value.original: The Project Window is used to define the projects which will be tracked via documents.

row.value: 项目窗口式用来定义通过文档跟踪的各个项目.
项目状态的摘要和细节

value.original: To report on your projects, select the project cycle and restricting parameters. If you miss certain projects check their status and if the project status is included in your Project cycle.

row.value: 选择项目环节和限制参数来报告你的项目.如果你缺少某些项目或者你没有把项目状态包括在项目环节里,可以在这检查他们的状态.

value.original: To enable accounting reporting of projects, create and enable a project segment in the account elements.

row.value: 用于启用项目的会计报告,使用账目元素创建项目部门.

value.original: System Elements are used to centrally define field labels, description and help. When translating an Element, the appropriate information of Fields in Windows, Parameters and Reports are translated (overwritten)

row.value: 系统元素用于集中定义域标签,描述和帮助.当翻译一个元素时,窗口的域,参数和报告中相应的信息都会被翻译.(覆盖原有值)

value.original: Translate the messages used in Windows, Forms and Processes

row.value: 翻译进程,窗口和表格里使用到的消息.

value.original: References are used as prefedined selection lists. You only need to translate the List Elements !!

row.value: 预定义的选择列表用来作为参考.你只需要翻译列表中的元素 !!

value.original: Translate the Name, Description and Help for Windows and Tabs. Most of the Fields are already translated, if they are centrally maintained.

row.value: 翻译窗口和标签的名称,描述和帮助. 如果集中设置了,大部分的区域已经翻译了.

value.original: Forms are special Windows and you need to translate its name, description and Help.

row.value: 表格是一种特殊的窗口,你需要翻译它的名称,描述和帮助.

value.original: Translate the Name, Description and Help for Processes and Reports. You don't need to translate the Parameters, if they are centrally maintained.

row.value: 翻译程序和报表的名称,描述和帮助.如果参数已经集中设置了,你就不用翻译它们了.

value.original: The Calendar Year and Periods defines the calendars that will be used for period control and reporting. You can also define non-standard calendars (e.g. business year from July to June).

row.value: 定义用于期间控制和报表的日历。你也可以定义非标准的日历（例如： 业务年有7月到6月）

value.original: The Account Element Window is used to define and maintain the Accounting Element and User Defined Elements. One of the account segments is your natural account segment (Chart of Account). You may add a new account element for parallel reporting or for user defined accounting segments.

row.value: 账目元素菜单用来定义和设置会计元素和用户自定义元素. 其中一个账目配置是默认的 (帐目图表). 你可能需要添加一个新的账目元素来完成用户自定义的账目配置的平行报告.

value.original: Maintain Accounting Schema - For changes to become effective you must re-login

row.value: 维护会计模式 - 重新登录后，所做的修改才能生效。

value.original: The Accounting Schema Window defines an accounting method and the elements that will comprise an account structure. Create and activate elements for detailed accounting for Business Partners, Products, Locations, etc.Review and change the GL and Default accounts. The actual accounts used in transactions depend on the executing organization; Most of the information is derived from the context.

row.value: 会计计划窗口定义了组成一个会计结构需要的一个会计方法和各个元素. 创建和启用对商业伙伴,产品,地点,等详细会计所需元素.检查和修改总帐和默认账目. 事务中使用的帐目取决于执行的组织; 大部分信息与上下文关联.

value.original: The GL Category Window allows you to define categories to be used in journals. These categories provide a method of optionally grouping and reporting on journals.

row.value: 总帐类别窗口允许你定义分类帐中使用的类别. 这些类别提供一种对优化的分组和报告分类帐的方法.

value.original: The Document Type Window defines any document to be used in the system. Each document type provides the basis for processing of each document and controls the printed name and document sequence used.

row.value: 此窗口定义了系统中所使用的任意文档。 每个文档类型都提供了每个文档处理的基础，控制了打印名称和所用的文档序列。

value.original: The Sequence Window defines how document numbers will be sequenced.Change the way document numbers are generated. You may add a prefix or a suffix or change the current number.

row.value: 次序窗口允许你定义文档号是如何排序的.修改文档编号的产生方法. 你可能添加一个前缀或者后缀或者修改现在的编号.

value.original: The Business Partner Group window allows you to define the accounting parameters at a group level. If you define the accounting parameters for a group any Business Partner entered using this group will have these accounting parameters automatically populated. You can then make any modifications necessary at the Business Partner level.

row.value: 商业伙伴分组窗口允许你在组级别上定义会计参数. 如果你为一个组定义了会计参数,任何属于这个组的商业伙伴都会自动拥有这些会计参数. 你可以在商业伙伴级别作必要的修改.

value.original: The Greeting Window defines a greeting that is then associated with a Business Partner or Business Partner Contact.

row.value: 问候窗口定义对一个商业伙伴或者商业伙伴联系的问候.

value.original: The Payment Terms Window defines the different payment terms that you offer your customers and that are offered to you by your vendors. Each invoice must contain a Payment Term. On the standard invoice, the Name and the Document Note of the Payment Term is printed.

row.value: 付款条款窗口定义你提供给客户或者销售商提供给你的不同的付款条款. 每一个合同必须包括一个付款条款. 在标准的发票上会打印付款条款的名称和文档注释.

value.original: The Invoice Schedule Window defines the frequency and cut off dates for generating summary invoices. If a customer requires a single invoice for multiple shipments you would define the appropriate invoice schedule and associate it with the Customer.

row.value: 发票时间表窗口定义生成汇总发票的频率和截止日期. 如果一个客户需要一张多次运输的独立独立发票,你需要定义相关的发票时间票并将其指定给该用户.

value.original: The Withholding Window defines the rule used for calculating withholding amounts.

row.value: 预扣窗口定义计算预扣数量的规则.

value.original: The Dunning Window defines the parameters that will be used when generating Dunning Letters. Each customer can be associated with a Dunning Code.

row.value: 催款窗口定义用于生成催款信的参数. 每个客户都可以被指定一个催款代码.

value.original: The Revenue Recognition Window defines the intervals at which revenue will be recognized. Alternatively, the revenue recognition may be linked to service levels provided.

row.value: 收入确认窗口定义即将确认的收入间隔. 另外,收入确认可能联系到提供的服务级别.

value.original: The Import Business Partner Window is an interim table which is used when importing external data into the system. Selecting the 'Process' button will either add or modify the appropriate records.

row.value: 导入商业伙伴窗口是一个用于向系统导入外部数据的临时表. 选择 '处理'按钮将添加或修改相关的记录.

value.original: The Business Partner window allows you do define any party with whom you transact. This includes customers, vendors and employees. Prior to entering or importing products, you must define your vendors. Prior to generating Orders you must define your customers. This window holds all information about your business partner and the values entered will be used to generate all document transactions

row.value: 在此此窗口你可以定义参与你的业务的各个参与方。包括客户、供应商和雇员。在录入或导入产品之前，你必须定义好供应商。在生成定单之前，米必须定义好你的供应商。此窗口包括了你的业务伙伴的所有信息，输入的值将被用于生成所有的文档业务。
将销售代表定义为用户

value.original: Users can log into the system and have access to functionality via one or more roles. Select the Business Partner you just set up. This enables the user to be treated as sales rep in the system.

row.value: 用户可以登入系统并通过一个或多个角色使用功能. 选择你刚才建立的商业伙伴. 这将启用用户另其在系统中作为商业代表.

value.original: Set up Sales Representative as Business Partner

row.value: 建立作为商业伙伴的销售代表

value.original: Set up the sales representative as Employee and Sales Representative in the Employee tab. Also set up the Vendor part, if you want to create payments.

row.value: 按照员工和员工列表里的销售代表建立销售代表. 如果你想创建付款,需要同时建立销售商部分.

value.original: The Sales Region Window defines the different regions where you do business. You can generate reports based on Sales Regions

row.value: 销售区域窗口定义你作生意不同的区域. 你可以基于销售区域生成报告.

value.original: Define how and when you want the commissions to be calculated and to whom to pay it.The Commissions Window allows you define how commissions and royalties will be paid. You can pay multiple commissions for the same order or invoice (e.g. to the person entering the transaction, to the person responsible for sale of the product (category) and or business partner (group).

row.value: 定义如何及何时你想计算佣金和支付给谁.佣金窗口允许你定义如何支付佣金和专利费. 你可以为一个订单或发票支付多种佣金 (例. 给参与事务处理的人, 给产品销售的责任人 (类别) 和或者商业伙伴 (组).

value.original: The Marketing Channel Window defines the different channels used in Marketing Campaigns

row.value: 市场渠道窗口定义市场活动中使用的不同的渠道.

value.original: The Marketing Campaign Window defines the start and end date for a campaign. It also gives a running balance of the invoice amounts which referred to this campaign.

row.value: 市场活动定义一次活动的开始和结束日期. 他也提供一个相关活动的基于发票数值的运营收支表.

value.original: Translate Name, Description and Help of Workflows and their Nodes. You only need to translate the List Elements !!

row.value: 翻译工作流程和结点的名称,描述和帮助. 你只需要翻译列表元素 !!

value.original: The Performance Color Window allows you to define the color schema to be used to indicate current performance. The system has predefined Red (below 50%), Yellow (below 100%) and green above 100. If you want to define your own color schema, do it here.

row.value: 业绩颜色窗口允许你定义指示当前业绩的颜色表. 系统已经预定义红色 (低于 50%), 黄色 (低于 100%) 和绿色高于100. 如果你想定义你自己的颜色表,请在这里完成.

value.original: Define how you calculate your performance measures

row.value: 定义如何计算你的业绩度量

value.original: Please test the statement in SQL*Plus first.The select statement needs to return a single value!Any restrictions for Date range, Organizations, Business Partners, Products should be done via the "Performance Measure" window. This is the generic calculation.As this tends to be somewhat technical, the system has a few examples predefined.

row.value: 请首先测试SQL*Plus语句.选择的语句应该返回一个唯一的值!任何对日期范围,组织,商业伙伴,产品的限制都应该通过"业绩度量"窗口实现. 这是一般性计算. 因为这需要一定的技术,系统有一些预定义的例子.

value.original: The Performance Measure Window allows you to define the rules and restrictions for performance measurement. You can, for example, restrict performance measurement to sales for a certain product category for a defined time frame.

row.value: 业绩度量窗口允许你定义业绩度量的规则和限制. 举例来说,你可以限定使用预定义的时间阶段对特定产品类别的销售作业就度量.

value.original: The Performance Achievement Window allows you to define Tasks to be achieved. The performance is measured by the percentage of reached achievements.

row.value: 业绩成果窗口允许你定义需要达成的任务. 业绩通过成果实现的百分比来计算.

value.original: The Performance Color Window allows you to define the color schema to be used to indicate current performance. The system has predefined Red (below 50%), Yellow (below 100%) and green above 100. If you want to define your own color schema, do it here.

row.value: 业绩颜色窗口允许你定义指示当前业绩的颜色表. 系统已经预定义红色 (低于 50%), 黄色 (低于 100%) 和绿色高于100. 如果你想定义你自己的颜色表,请在这里完成.

value.original: You need to have a mail server and an email address from which the requets an notifications are sent. Optionally, if you define a mail user and password, requests are read from the mail users's folder and imported into the system.

row.value: 你需要拥有一个邮件服务器和电子邮件地址来发送检查请求. 额外的,如果你定义一个邮件用户和密码,请求从邮件用户目录中读取并被导入系统.

value.original: Please ensure that users have a email address and supervisor assigned.

row.value: 请确认用户用户拥有电子邮件帐户并且被管理员指定.

value.original: Check Business Partners for Request processing

row.value: 按请求处理检查商业伙伴

value.original: You can send EMails to businbess partners. Make sure, that the business partners and/or the Contacts have email addresses.

row.value: 你可以给你的商业伙伴发送电子邮件. 请确认商业伙伴或者联系人拥有电子邮件地址.

value.original: The Request Processor Window allows you to define different processes that you want to occur and the frequency and timing of these processes

row.value: 请求处理器窗口允许你定义你想生成的不同的处理程序和这些程序的频率及时序.

value.original: The Request Window is used to define and track any request assigned to you.

row.value: 请求窗口用来定义和跟踪任何指派给你的请求.

value.original: The Warehouse and Locators Window defines each Warehouse, any Locators for that Warehouse and the Accounting parameters to be used for inventory in that Warehouse.

row.value: 仓库和土地窗口定义每个仓库,仓库使用的土地和用于仓库目录的会计参数.

value.original: The Unit of Measure Window is used to define non monetary units of measure. It also defines if conversion between units of measure are allowed and how they are to be performed. The system provides some automatic conversions between units of measures (e.g. minute, hour, day, working day, etc.) if they are not explicitly defined here.Conversions need to be direct (i.e. if you have only a conversion between A-B and B-C, the system cannot convert A-C, you need to define it explicitly).

row.value: 度量单位窗口定义非钱币的度量单位. 它也定义如果两个单位之间可以互相转换是怎么转换的. 一些度量单位如果没有专门在这定义,系统提供它们的自动转换 (例. 分钟, 小时, 天, 工作日, 等.). 转换需要是直接转换 (例. 如果你只有 A-B 和 B-C 的转换,系统无法转换 A-C, 你需要独立定义它).

value.original: The Product Category allows you to define different groups of products. These groups can be used in generating Price Lists, defining margins and for easily assigning different accounting parameters for products.

row.value: 产品类别允许你定义不同的产品组. 这些分组可以用于生成价格列表,定义利润并使给产品指定不同的会计参数变得简便.

value.original: The Product Window defines all products used by an organization. These products include those sold to customers, used in the manufacture of products sold to customers and products purchased by an organization.

row.value: 此窗口定义一个机构使用的所有产品。产品包括下手给客户的产品，用于制造销售给客户的产品的产品，和机构采购的产品。

value.original: Trade discount schema calculates the trade discount percentage

row.value: 交易折扣表计算交易折扣比率.

value.original:
The Price List Window allows you to generate product price lists for your Business Partners. Price lists determine currency and tax treatment. Price list versions allow to maintain parallel lists for different date ranges. The most current pricelist version is used based on the document date.
All pricelists have three prices: List, Standard and Limit
First step is to create a base price list. You can manually add products and enter the prices or create them automatically. The base price list is often the purchase price list with list price ('official' retail price), the standard price (your purchase price). The limit price can be used to check your final purchase costs after discounts, rebates, etc.
Pricelists can be calculated and copied. To speed up the calculation, the parameters are stored an used when creating a new price list version.

row.value:
价格表窗口允许你为你的商业伙伴生成产品价格表. 价格表确定汇率和税费处理. 价格表版本允许按不同的时间段设置平行的价格表. 当前使用的价格表版本根据文档日期决定.
所有的价格表包括三种价格: 列表价格,标准价格和限价
第一步是创建一个基本价格表. 你可以手动添加产品并输入价格或者自动创建. 基本价格表经常就是按列表价格的进货价格表 ('官方的' 零售价), 基本价格 (你的进货价格). 限价用来检查折扣和回款等后的最终的进货成本.
价格表可以被计算和复制. 为了提高计算速度,创建一个新的价格表版本时会使用保存的参数.

value.original: The Business Partner window allows you do define any party with whom you transact. This includes customers, vendors and employees. Prior to entering or importing products, you must define your vendors. Prior to generating Orders you must define your customers. This window holds all information about your business partner and the values entered will be used to generate all document transactions

row.value: 在此此窗口你可以定义参与你的业务的各个参与方。包括客户、供应商和雇员。在录入或导入产品之前，你必须定义好供应商。在生成定单之前，米必须定义好你的供应商。此窗口包括了你的业务伙伴的所有信息，输入的值将被用于生成所有的文档业务。

value.original: The Tax Category Window is used to enter and maintain Tax Categories. Each product is associated with a tax category which facilitates reacting changing tax rates.

row.value: 税费类别窗口用来输入和设置税费类别. 每个产品都要指定一个使税率变化处理更简单的税费类别.

value.original: The Product Window defines all products used by an organization. These products include those sold to customers, used in the manufacture of products sold to customers and products purchased by an organization.

row.value: 此窗口定义一个机构使用的所有产品。产品包括下手给客户的产品，用于制造销售给客户的产品的产品，和机构采购的产品。

value.original: The Charges Window defines the different charges that may be incurred. These can include Bank Charges, Vendor Charges and Handling Charges.

row.value: 费用窗口定义可能产生的不同的费用. 这可以包括银行费用,销售商费用和处理费用.
设置不同的税和它们的比率

value.original: The Tax Rate Window defines the different taxes used for each tax category. For example, Sales Tax must be defined for each State in which it applies.

row.value: 税率窗口定义税费类别里使用的不同的税. 举例来说, 销售税必须按它适用的国家定义.

value.original: Maintain Accounting Schema - For changes to become effective you must re-login

row.value: 维护会计模式 - 重新登录后，所做的修改才能生效。

value.original: The Accounting Schema Window defines an accounting method and the elements that will comprise an account structure. Create and activate elements for detailed accounting for Business Partners, Products, Locations, etc.Review and change the GL and Default accounts. The actual accounts used in transactions depend on the executing organization; Most of the information is derived from the context.

row.value: 会计计划窗口定义了组成一个会计结构需要的一个会计方法和各个元素. 创建和启用对商业伙伴,产品,地点,等详细会计所需元素.检查和修改总帐和默认账目. 事务中使用的帐目取决于执行的组织; 大部分信息与上下文关联.

value.original: The Tax Category Window is used to enter and maintain Tax Categories. Each product is associated with a tax category which facilitates reacting changing tax rates.

row.value: 税费类别窗口用来输入和设置税费类别. 每个产品都要指定一个使税率变化处理更简单的税费类别.

value.original: Load flat Files into import tables

row.value: 向输入的表格中装入原始文件

value.original: The Import File Loader parses the content of a flat file and loads it into import tables. Comments start with a '[' and end with a ']' and are ignored; example: [Some Heading].

row.value: 导入文件加载器分析原始文件的内容并将其载入导入的表格中. 注释的内容由'['作为开始符,']'作为结束符; 例: [一些标题].

value.original: The Import Natural Account Window is an interim table which is used when importing external data into the system. Selecting the 'Process' button will either add or modify the appropriate records.

row.value: 导入帐目窗口是用来向系统导入外部数据的临时表. 选择 '处理' 按钮将添加或修改相关的记录.

value.original: The Data Replication Strategy determines which tables and how they are replicated. Note that the migration does not syncronize Application Dictionary items.

row.value: 数据维护策略决定哪些表及其如何被复制.. 注意合并不会对应用程序目录项进行同步化.

value.original:
Data Replication Target Details. Set up your system completely on the central system, before setting up the replication. Define the Replication target here and export the database and import it on the remote system.

Before(!) entering transactions, Start the Replication Run to set up the remote system.

row.value:
数据复制目标的详细资料. 在建立复制之前,在中央系统上建立完整的系统. 在这里定义复制目标,导出数据库并将其导入远程系统.

在进入传输前(!), 开始运行复制来创建远程系统.

value.original: In the cost center window there are all the cost center present on the enterprise.

row.value: 企业当前的所有花费都在成本中心窗口里.

value.original: Is the the Cost center Unit of measure window

row.value: 是成本中心度量单位窗口

value.original: The Product Window defines all products used by an organization. These products include those sold to customers, used in the manufacture of products sold to customers and products purchased by an organization.

row.value: 此窗口定义一个机构使用的所有产品。产品包括下手给客户的产品，用于制造销售给客户的产品的产品，和机构采购的产品。
